mapper.sql: opp.id as id, opp.product_number as productN, opp.en_name as productEnName, opp.fr_name as productFrName, opp.cn_name as productCnName, opp.sum_parts_qty as qty, opp.production_cycle as productionCycle

opp.id as id, opp.product_number as productN, opp.fr_name as productFrName, opp.en_name as productEnName, opp.cn_name as productCnName, ifnull(opp.sum_parts_qty, 0) as qty, if(opp.sum_parts_qty = 0, false, true) as partList

where opp.dr = 0 and opp.product_type = 5 and opp.user_id=#{userId}
and (opp.product_number like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or opp.en_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or opp.cn_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or opp.fr_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )

where opp.dr = 0 and opp.user_id=#{userId} and opp.product_type=4
and (opp.cn_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or opp.fr_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or opp.en_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or opp.product_number like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )
mapper.select: select opd.product_number as productN from ope_parts_product opd where opd.dr = 0 group by productN
select sec.id as id, sec.name as name, sec.code as code, sec.note as description from ope_parts_sec sec where sec.dr = 0

select oppb.id as id, parts.id as pratsId, parts.parts_number as partsNumber, parts.sec as sec, parts.en_name as enName, parts.cn_name as cnName, parts.fr_name as frName, ifnull(parts.production_cycle, 0) as productionCycle, oppb.parts_qty as qty from ope_parts_product_b oppb inner join ope_parts parts on oppb.parts_id = parts.id and parts.dr = 0 where oppb.dr = 0 and oppb.parts_product_id =#{id} and oppb.user_id=#{userId}

select productB.* from ope_parts_product_b productB inner join ope_parts parts on parts.id = productB.parts_id and parts.dr = 0 inner join ope_parts_draft draft on parts.parts_draft_id = draft.id and draft.dr = 0 where productB.dr = 0 and draft.id in
#{item}
select count(*) from ope_parts parts left join ope_supplier os on parts.supplier_id = os.id and os.dr = 0

select parts.id, parts.user_id, parts.Import_lot, parts.parts_type, parts.sec, parts.parts_number, parts.cn_name, parts.fr_name, parts.en_name, case when (parts.sn_class='1') then 'SC' else 'SSC' end as snClassFlag, parts.parts_qty, parts.production_cycle, parts.supplier_id, parts.dwg, parts.note, parts.revision, parts.created_time, os.supplier_name, parts.synchronize_flag, parts.id_class from ope_parts parts left join ope_supplier os on parts.supplier_id = os.id and os.dr = 0
order by parts.created_time desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
